ygData.subject: Re: [gladiator] Superman is a wimp
ygData.msgSnippet: I do hope you realize that impotence can also mean lacking in power, as to act effectively.

I do hope you realize that impotence can also mean lacking in power, as to 
act effectively.

> lol,  must we worry about impotent characters :)  what if you get an
>  impotent slime?  whould it not be able to devide, or is impotence not an
>  issue with asexual creatures?
>  
>  dph of rules wrote
>  
>  > Also, I certainly realize that, although reaching the limits
>  > established may seem impossible now, if someone else takes off where I
>  > plan on leaving by creating scenarios that make teams even stronger,
>  > there may be a future problems developing as characters reach
>  > impotence.
>
